name: [Reincarnation collection]
description:
*physical painting
*Size: 60 × 80
*Oil paint on canvas
*Artist: Roya vali


 Reincarnation is a concept related to post-mortem destiny.  After death, either man perishes, or a soul independent of the body that does not die with the death of the body guarantees the survival of man alone and without a body, or the survival of man through the restoration of the body or through the resurrection of the soul and body together.  It will be provided on the Day of Judgment or the soul will continue to live in the same world in various bodies.  Also, according to the discussion of the world of example by some Islamic philosophers, it can be assumed that man survives through an exemplary body.  Of course, it should be noted that although the belief in life after death generally involves the belief in something immaterial and separate from the material body, belief in the soul in the sense that exists in the West and the Islamic world is not necessar.
